response.job_title: Co-founder Euronear | COO | Delivery Director | Project Manager | QA lead | Agile Methodologies | Electrical Engineer | ICT |
response.summary:
Professional with experience in the management of software development, electrical energy and telecommunications projects, which has allowed me to lead technical teams and manage national and international clients. In addition, I have experience in software development as a Project Manager, Product Manager, QA Lead and QA Analyst, which has allowed me to have a critical and detailed approach to error identification, process optimization, and delivery projects.

My experience as an HSEQ Internal Auditor and in project direction and management has given me skills in risk management, identifying improvement opportunities and implementing corrective actions.

As a teacher, I have developed skills for effective communication and the transmission of complex knowledge in a simple and easy-to-understand way.

In addition, I have volunteered as a moderator and panelist at the STEM Career Forum, which has enabled me to inspire young women to explore careers in science, technology, engineering, and math fields.

I am willing to accept new challenges and learn continuously to continue improving in my professional career.
response.skills: Agile Project Management, Team Leadership, Budget Management, Time Efficiency, Resource Management, Collaboration, Test Strategy Development, Defect Management, Client Collaboration, Quality Assurance Expertise, Problem-Solving, Client Relationship Management, Continuous Improvement, Strategic Thinking, Leadership, Decision-Making, Communication Skills, Visionary Outlook, Habilidades interpersonales, Eficacia organizacional

profile_positions.description: Responsible for driving operational excellence and strategic growth in a leading tech company. I oversee all aspects of the organization, including project management, human resources, finance, and administration with a focus on delivering exceptional partners experiences. By implementing efficient processes, fostering cross-functional collaboration, and optimizing resource allocation, I have achieved significant milestones, including improved project delivery, increased revenue, and enhanced talent acquisition.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & COO

profile_positions.description:
Lead end-to-end project delivery and ensure exceptional client satisfaction. With a focus on efficient execution, strong client engagement, and team leadership, I have successfully delivered complex software projects, implemented standardized frameworks, and optimized resource allocation. By driving process improvements and fostering a high-performance culture, I have contributed as a trusted provider of quality solutions in the industry.

Industries: Healthcare, logistics, EdTech, e-commerce, sports, project management, among others.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Director

profile_positions.description:
- Design and implement quality control SoPs .
- Team management, task assignment, helping team in task review, estimates, and tracking QA deliverables.
- Collaboration with developers, project managers, and product owners.
- Customer communication, including delivering periodic status reports and leading sprint planning meetings
- Audit and monitoring of KPI's of the products.
- Design and execution of test cases in all  environments dev / stage / prod
- Testing of Web Applications, Mobile Applications.
- Manual Testing, UI/UX, Functionality, Performance, Load and Compatibility tests.
- Defect reporting, root cause analysis (RCA), scheduling bug triage meetings, and assisting developers in defect analysis and reproduction.
- Collaborate with developers and PM to identify and resolve defects in a timely manner.
profile_positions.title: QA lead

profile_positions.description:
Lead multifaceted software projects, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to align project goals with client objectives.
- Developed and executed project plans, managing budgets, resources, and timelines with precision, maintaining a budget and timeline compliance rate above 90%
- Collaborated with clients to define project scopes, requirements, and deliverables.
- Implemented Agile methodologies, streamlining project workflows and accelerating development cycles by 20% while maintaining strict quality standards.
- Lead a dispersed team, promoting synergy and effective communication, resulting in increased productivity and project cohesion.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Ensure software quality by designing and executing complete test cases.
- Identify and understand customer requirements.
- Identify and report issues, bugs, failures, and improvements.
- Work closely with customers and the team to develop a product that meets their requirements.
- Test methodologies: Agile, Scrum
- Types of tests: integration tests, performance tests, smoke tests, regression tests
- Mobile tests: experience test on iOS and Android platforms
- Industries: health, wellness, education, e-commerce, staffing, project management, among others.
profile_positions.title: QA Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Project engineer in PMO office of telecommunications and power energy.
- Support Engineer at San Andrés Fiber Optic Submarine Cable.
- Analyze requirements of stakeholders to develop technical-economic proposals for engineering solutions integrating all stages, from planning to execution, operation and maintenance.
- Design and program portfolio management control system in Java.
- Management of technical teams in energy quality projects, energy backup system and HVAC system with traditional project methodologies - Waterfall
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Teacher of mathematics, physics, quantitative reasoning and financial education.
- Teaching face-to-face and virtual classes.
- Preparation of classes and didactic materials.
profile_positions.title: Professor

profile_positions.description:
- Measurements and monitoring of KPI's in the maintenance area.
- Design and implementation of technical improvements in machines to increase safety in mechanical protection systems.
- Assistance in production and maintenance tasks of production lines.
- Monitoring of energy consumption and energy quality to design projects to improve quality from a regulatory point of view with the network operator and internally with redundancy equipment.
- Leadership in the Total Waste project to reduce the waste of raw materials through good practices and technological improvements.
profile_positions.title: Engineering intern

profile_positions.description:
Administrative Assistant in the ABET international high-quality accreditation process for the undergraduate Electrical Engineering program at the National University of Colombia.
- Logistic coordination of events and meetings for the accreditation process.
- Development and monitoring of work plans and schedules.
- Communication and negotiation with stakeholders.
- Document and administrative management of the process.
profile_positions.title: Administrative assistant

profile_positions.description:
I provided face-to-face and virtual tutoring in electromagnetic fields, physics fundamentals, and electrical circuits.
- Development of digital educational materials for sharing on institutional virtual channels.
- Personalized attention and academic follow-up for students.
- Effective communication and collaboration with the academic team.
- Contribution to the improvement of teaching and learning processes.
profile_positions.title: Tutor

company.name: Euronear Consulting
company.description: We are a nearshoring company that connects development teams with businesses all across Europe. Thanks to our operating model, our partners access to top-notch talent to boost their IT capabilities, while they focus on what is important for their businesses.
